subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit 4 restructuring
msgSnippet: #: David Saff changed the world a bit at a time by saying on  10/28/2005 3:39 PM :# ... To me is not a problem, as I am using TestNG :-). ./alex -- .w(
messageBody:
#: David Saff changed the world a bit at a time by saying on 10/28/2005 3:39 PM :#
> Alexandru Popescu wrote:
>
>> > This brings up one request I'd have for Eclipse: I'd like to be able to
>> > change the superclass Eclipse chooses when I do New > JUnit Test Case.
>> > Does anyone know how to do that?
>>
>> iirc that is hardcoded down in the plugin, so there is no way to
>> change it.
>
> https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/ is the way to change it...
>
> David Saff
>

To me is not a problem, as I am using TestNG :-).

./alex
--
.w( the_mindstorm )p.
